result.eng: However bad things are today, they could be worse tomorrow.
result.ga: Dá dhonacht rudaí inniu d'fhéadfaidís bheith níos measa amárach
result.orig: Dá dhonacht rudaí inniu d'fhéadfaidís bheith níos measa amárach
result.html: Dá dhonacht rudaí inniu d'fhéadfaidís bheith níos measa amárachHowever bad things are today, they could be worse tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Dá ḋonaċt rudaí inniu d'ḟéadfaidís ḃeiṫ níos measa amáraċHowever bad things are today, they could be worse tomorrow.

result.eng: From this day on the weather usually worsens.
result.ga: Is ag dul i ndonacht a bhíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amach
result.orig: Is ag dul i ndonacht a bhíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amach
result.html: Is ag dul i ndonacht a bhíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amachFrom this day on the weather usually worsens.
result.ponchtml: Is ag dul i ndonaċt a ḃíonn an aimsir ón lá seo amaċFrom this day on the weather usually worsens.
